name: Jour Meth: Multimedia Reporting
title: JOUR JOUR 400-0-20 Jour Meth: Multimedia Reporting
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes

descriptions.name: Overview of Class
descriptions.value: Contact the department for further information

subject: JOUR

overview_of_class: Have you ever wondered how they put together audio stories on NPR's This American Life? Maybe Dorothea Lange's photos of the Great Depression are an inspiration. Or perhaps it's something more current such as the videos of Vice that make you take notice. Even if you have no interest in pursuing multimedia reporting to that extent, a basic knowledge of multimedia is imperative in Journalism today and this class is where it starts. This course will give students exposure to audio storytelling, photojournalism and video storytelling. Students will learn the software, hardware and production skills in each medium to transcend amateurish mistakes and report with sound, still pictures and video.
